const char* setting::get_cstr ( const std::string &  key,
const char *  defval = NULL 
) const [inline]

Gets a value using key and conver it to c-style string.

You need to copy the value immediately. It may changed after next get_* call.

Parameters:
key The Key.
defval Default value to be returned if key doesn't exist.
Returns:
The value of given key or defval if key doesn't exist.
